services.title: Backend Development
services.description: We specialize in building scalable and high-performance backend systems, ensuring secure data management, efficient APIs, and seamless integration with front-end applications.

services.title: Frontend Development
services.description: We create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces, leveraging modern frameworks to deliver responsive and interactive web applications that enhance user experience.

services.title: System Design Consultations
services.description: We provide expert guidance on designing scalable and resilient system architectures, helping you choose the right technologies, frameworks, and best practices to optimize performance and reliability.

services.title: VOD Application Consultation
services.description: We offer expert consultation on building and optimizing Video on Demand (VOD) applications, including content streaming strategies, cloud-based infrastructure, and user experience enhancements.

aboutpara: I am Dimuthu, a passionate software engineer with a strong background in building scalable systems, AI, and cloud technologies. With years of experience in backend and frontend development, I specialize in designing and developing robust, high-performance applications. My expertise spans microservices architecture, cloud computing, and real-time data processing.  Beyond coding, I enjoy sharing my knowledge through writing and content creation, helping developers understand complex topics in a simple and practical way. I have built and contributed to various projects, including Video on Demand (VOD) platforms, AI-powered applications, and e-commerce systems. I am always excited to take on new challenges and collaborate on innovative projects. Whether it's system design, software development, or technical consultation, I am committed to delivering high-quality solutions that drive impact.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with NodeJS, React, Typescript, and most of the Web frameworks and Cloud Environments.

experiences.bullets: Planned and migrated the media transcoder and CDN from AWS to Tencent VOD, Developed NestJS backend APIs for transcoding and file management in Tencent VOD, Developed backend APIs for QalBox Live Stream Project, Developed and implemented an Admin Console for Qalbox Content Team using React and NodeJS.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer at Sysco Labs
experiences.bullets: Led Freight Management Apps team while overseeing FRDT CFM and SID applications, Enhanced query performance of the Application. Implemented SonarQube for code quality assurance, Established a data import pipeline using AWS Kinesis.
Designed and implemented a secure file server using NodeJS, Configured Docker Swarm for DirectFN CMS, Developed test automation using Selenium and Node.js.

Recognized as the Best Computer Engineering Industrial Trainee of 2018, Implemented a service to move temporary voice recording files to a permanent location, Designed and developed a security dispatch solution using Android Firebase and PHP.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
